actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility studies of the enlargement of Shasta Dam and Reservoir, Central Valley Project, California, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility studies concerning: (1) enlarging Shasta Dam and Reservoir, California, or replacing such dam; and (2) using the Sacramento River for conveying water downstream from such enlarged dam and reservoir. Requires State participation in the studies and the costs of the studies.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility studies of the enlargement of Shasta Dam and Reservoir, Central Valley Project, California, and for other purposes.
